name: Integrity
detailed_description: When nuclear bomb destroys Earth, the only people left  are those on the international space stations in orbit. Three generations later, the survivors living on a space stations see their resources fade and face draconian measures made to ensure humanity's future. Desperately looking for a solution, the space stations leaders send prisoners back to the planet to test its habitability. but with the fate of the human race in their hands, they must forge a path into the unknown.
about_the_game: When nuclear bomb destroys Earth, the only people left  are those on the international space stations in orbit. Three generations later, the survivors living on a space stations see their resources fade and face draconian measures made to ensure humanity's future. Desperately looking for a solution, the space stations leaders send prisoners back to the planet to test its habitability. but with the fate of the human race in their hands, they must forge a path into the unknown.
short_description: When life on Earth is destroyed the only survivors are those on the space stations in orbit Three generations later the survivors on ark Must face drastic measures made to ensure humanity's future looking for a solution the ark's leaders send prisoners back to the planet to test its habitability

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™2 Quad Processor Q6600
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800 GT
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-650
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 550 Ti
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
